com.j2bugzilla.base

Class Product

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.j2bugzilla.base.Product

  • public class Product
extends Object
    A Product object represents a product category on the Bugzilla installation. Each product has a unique ID, and each Bug is associated with exactly one Product.
    Author:
    Tom

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Product(int id, String name)
      Creates a new Product object with the specified unique ID and name.
      Product(String name)
      Creates a new Product to be submitted to the Bugzilla installation.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Product

        public Product(int id,
               String name)
        Creates a new Product object with the specified unique ID and name.
        Parameters:
        id - An integer representing the unique product ID.
        name - A String representing the unique product name.

      • Product

        public Product(String name)
        Creates a new Product to be submitted to the Bugzilla installation. Useful when creating a new product via the webservice.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the new product.

    • Method Detail

      • getID

        public int getID()
        Returns the ID of this Product. If the product was not retrieved from the webservice, returns -1.
        Returns:
        An integer representing the ID of this product.

      • getName

        public String getName()
        Returns the name of this Product.
        Returns:
        A String representing the product name.

      • setDescription

        public void setDescription(String description)
        Sets the description of this Product.
        Parameters:
        description - A String representing this product's description.

      • getDescription

        public String getDescription()
        Returns the description of this Product.
        Returns:
        A String describing this product.
